scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.dist: npm run node && npm run web
scripts.node: shx rm -rf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc
scripts.web: shx rm -rf web && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run tslint
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-web
scripts.test-cli: npm run test-node && npm run test-web-headless
scripts.test-web-headless: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NO_DETECT=1 karma start --single-run --browsers ChromeHeadless
scripts.docdist: cd doc && git clean -fd && git rm -rf * && cd .. && npm run doc && cd doc && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -m doc && git push
scripts.doc: typedoc --mode modules --out doc --readme Readme.md --name "API Document" --disableOutputCheck --includeDeclarations --excludeNotExported lib && cd doc && git status && cd ..
